replies.body: Do you like Anime (Jap Cartoons)
replies.body_tagged: Do you like Anime (Jap Cartoons)

replies.body: @kev884 Yes I do and I watch them daily.
replies.body_tagged: @kev884 Yes I do and I watch them daily.

replies.body:
List all the Anime you have watched and tell me what are the best ones.
Include some Ecchi, Harem, Action animes as well!
replies.body_tagged:
List all the Anime you have watched and tell me what are the best ones.
Include some Ecchi, Harem, Action animes as well!

replies.body:
Not sure if this list has them all but I'll try my best...

FMA and FMA Brotherhood, No Game No life, Mekakucity actors, Date a live, Mirai Nikki, Elfen Lied, Code Geass, Corpse Party, SAO, No-Rin, Clannad, Black butler, To Love-Ru, High school DxD, Attack On Titan, Death Note, Angel Beats and Tokyo Ghoul (Haven't watched all of it but seems good from what I've seen).

What I would recommend are No Game No Life (Amazing, just watch it, ok?), Mekakucity actors, High School DxD In case you haven't watched it, Date a live and No-Rin (Really underrated, it's Comedy and Harem.)
replies.body_tagged:
Not sure if this list has them all but I'll try my best...

FMA and FMA Brotherhood, No Game No life, Mekakucity actors, Date a live, Mirai Nikki, Elfen Lied, Code Geass, Corpse Party, SAO, No-Rin, Clannad, Black butler, To Love-Ru, High school DxD, Attack On Titan, Death Note, Angel Beats and Tokyo Ghoul (Haven't watched all of it but seems good from what I've seen).

What I would recommend are No Game No Life (Amazing, just watch it, ok?), Mekakucity actors, High School DxD In case you haven't watched it, Date a live and No-Rin (Really underrated, it's Comedy and Harem.)

replies.body: How do you suggest I survive while waiting for episode 15 of the english dubbed Attack on Titan to be released?

replies.body: Do you like waiting for Anime? Like waiting for High School DxD Season 3, or waiting for the next episode which is 1 week away of an anime?
replies.body_tagged: Do you like waiting for Anime? Like waiting for High School DxD Season 3, or waiting for the next episode which is 1 week away of an anime?

replies.body:
I think I started something ._. 4 AMA's in 1 hour :o
@gibbo, Watch subbed, IMO it's better.
@Ingigo, Nobody likes waiting, but I guess it kinda makes it better if you wait for something for a long time and then get to finally see it. (Expect if it'll be as bad as SAO II)
